title: After Cook
creator_credit: Don Murray, Malcolm Otton and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
brief_description: A look at the Australian people, their character, attitudes, and way of life. Australians, in the city and the bush, are examined both at home and while enjoying their favourite pastimes. Note: A short version of 28 minutes, intended mainly for overseas viewers, was also produced, entitled ‘Everything under the sun. Commentator: John Meillon.
